rows.label: qev010101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Heh. This car yours, buddy? Then it's your own fault!
BLADEs ain't allowed to park here, see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, well. I heard rumors there were ruffians going
about hounding BLADEs, and now here you are.
This is my lucky day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Let me guess—you rocket scientists used to be BLADEs
yourselves, right? But something set you off, so you left
to form this gang. How pathetic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0004
rows.name:
And here I was thinking you'd be something special,
when you're just a common pack of thugs.
It's almost disappointing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0005
rows.name:
You got a big mouth, pip-squeak.
I bet it would look better if I knocked out a few teeth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0006
rows.name: Please. I've no interest in low-level chumps like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0007
rows.name:
I fear I'm something of a traditionalist, you see.
Either give me a great evil worthy of facing justice,
or don't waste my time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0008
rows.name:
Enough with the fancy talk!
Put up your dukes before I END YOU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh, I wholly encourage you to try...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0010
rows.name:
But be warned: agents of swift justice always step forth
after a chump drops a cheesy line like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_JNK0010
rows.name: Step Forth

rows.label: qev010101_SEL0011
rows.name: Reveal yourself in front of the ruffians to save Justin.

rows.label: qev010101_JNK0020
rows.name: Stay Put

rows.label: qev010101_SEL0021
rows.name: Sit back and see where this is going.

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0011
rows.name: See?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0012
rows.name:
More BLADEs? Pfft. This was supposed to be an unfair
fight! Why you wussin' out on us like this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0013
rows.name:
You got lucky today, BLADE. Might not be so lucky
tomorrow, if you get my drift. ...Come on, boys!
Let's make like bananas and split![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0014
rows.name: ...Phew![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0015
rows.name:
You soft in the head or somethin', kid?
Grow up already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0016
rows.name:
There ain't no heroes on this planet—especially the kind
who wear tights. So forget about anyone comin' to
save your bacon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Pah! Don't you know that heroes always show up at
the last minute?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0018
rows.name: ...See?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0019
rows.name:
More BLADEs? Pfft. This was supposed to be an unfair
fight! Why you wussin' out on us like this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0020
rows.name:
You got lucky today, BLADE. But you might not be so
lucky tomorrow, if you get my drift. ...Come on, boys!
Let's make like bananas and split![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0022
rows.name: Thank you. I think you just saved my teeth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0023
rows.name:
I heard talk about a gang that was causing mischief
around here, so I decided to take a look. And believe
you me, I didn't need to look for very long![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0024
rows.name:
But alas, those ruffians saw fit to wreck my ride. I'm at
a bit of a loss as to what to do about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_JNK0030
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev010101_SEL0031
rows.name: Express sympathy for Justin's predicament.

rows.label: qev010101_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev010101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Justin to tell you about his attackers.

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Hey, that's pretty thoughtful. Did anyone ever tell you
that you're perfect protagonist material?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0026
rows.name:
I've always been enamored with the classic morality
tale. You know? [ST:gender p1=Hero p2=Heroine ] meets evildoer and beats the
stuffing out of him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0027
rows.name:
What's to tell? I'd hoped they were villains of vision
and character, but they turned out to be common
street thugs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Not to say this whole incident has been a waste,
though. I met you, and you seem to be something
of a major player.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Oh, I almost forgot. My name is Justin, and I'm
a BLADE. It's good to meet you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0030
rows.name:
And you're...[ST:playername ], huh?
Well, you've got yourself a new fan,
[ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Since you seem to be cut from the cloth of a [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ],
do you think you could help me find some replacement
parts for my poor car?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0032
rows.name:
With the right parts, I'll have it repaired in no time!
I'll just...stay here and think of some heroic questions
for you while you're gone. Look forward to it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0033
rows.name:
I knew you'd accept! You're the type to always say yes,
no matter how absurd the request may be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0034
rows.name:
It's because you're an agent of justice!
Such things are in your DNA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev010101_SEL0051
rows.name: Puff up your chest and agree vehemently.

rows.label: qev010101_JNK0060
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev010101_SEL0061
rows.name: Shake your head and admit that you're no [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ].

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0035
rows.name:
I like the cut of your jib! It takes that sort of
determination to tackle each new evil that arises.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0036
rows.name:
The classic [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] response—bold of action,
yet humble of spirit. One such as yourself would
never brag about your derring-do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010101_MSG0037
rows.name:
In any case, what I need is a pair of anhydrous
radiators. Got it? Thanks a million, [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]![ST:wait ]
